S.FORM: Central african republic u siwkay nu kanatal u Central african republic sa i labu nu Africa, itiza i 7 00 N, 21 00 E, u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa 622,984 km2, u ahebal nu lala'ay sa 622,984 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa 0 km2 hamin nu tademaw sa 5,507,257. kakalukan umah sa 8.10%, kilakilangan umah sa 36.20%, zumaay henay umah sa 55.70% tapang tusu nu kanatal u tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Bangui . kakininan nu kanatal demiad kakining nu kanatal demiad sa 1 bulad 12 demiad. tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Faustin-Archange Touadéra, micakat a demiad sa i 2016 a mihca 3 bulad 30 demiad. u hata u kulit nu hata kina kanatal sa, silima ku kulit, u semilaway, u sangelacay, u landaway, u takuliway atu sumanahay. sibunac a kulit i kalimucu nu hata. u sulit nu zuma a kamu u sulit nu Hulam: 中非共和國 u sulit nu Lipun: 中央アフリカ共和国 u sulit nu Amilik: Central African Republic Central african republic "Fa-yu , République centrafricaine", "Sang-ke-yu , Ködörösêse tî Bêafrîka", singangan tu nu Zung-bey , Ban-ci u kahenulan a tuse nu Zung-bey , i tini i tebang nu Zung-bey a kanatal,mala u lalabuay a tukus nu kanatal, Zung-bey namakaysatipan malingatu duduc tu nu piliyuc nu tuki a pasayzaan, pasazumaen tu Ke-may-lung , Cha-de , Su-tan , Nan-su-tan , Democratic Republic of the Congo atu Congo, the republic of the matatules tulala', Zung-bey palekal i 1958 a mihcaan 12 a bulad, namalingatu tu pangkiw a misakaku kunu cenhuay satu 1960 a mihcaan 8 a bulad 13 a demiad tatengaay tu manusakamu tu mamisateked, kahenulan a tuse a Ban-ci upabelin a kamu Ban-cy han, i tini i U-ban-ci-he mililis nu tukus i tapiingan nu tuse. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 中非共和國(法語:République centrafricaine；桑戈語:Ködörösêse tî Bêafrîka),通稱中非,班基(Bangui)- (Bangui, (Oubangui)沿岸的邊境城市.) ayaw nu Zung-bey tungusay nu U-ban-ci-siya-li (Territoire d'Oubangui-Chari)a lala', nu Fa-ku i tiniay i Fay-cow nu micumutay, 1960 a mihcaan namisateked, Central african republic mikilul tu nu hulic mikeliday a tademaw ku mikuwanay pasu nacacay mademec mitanam tu nu hung-ti a lice, 1993 a mihcaan, i kacakat nu ka cunusan tu demiad tanutuwa' saku suni nu binawlan, Zung-bey kinacacay henay nu binawlan a pisingkiw ci An-ze-fay-li-ke-si-pa-ta-say ku mala cung-tungay, 2003 a mihcaan Zung-bey masumat kukawaw nu hitay, ci Pa-ta-say-pa-fu-lang-suo-wa-bo-ci-ze u sakakaay a hitay mapaales. 2004 a mihcaan mabuwah mangangaay ku lalabuay, anu mahicahica milihiza tu nu tatusa a ngangayaw i 2007 a mihcaan masasulit paketun tu masasukapah a tatelek , atu 2011 a mihcaan masasulit makaketun asa tu zumaay cacay a lice, a masasukapah a tateled, nika i 2012 a mihcaan masacukah aca, lalid satu mangangaay atu milihicaay a ngangayaw sikuwang sibakudang tuku sakaput katuud macunus tuku micalap tu mikuwanay tu tademaw a kawaw, mahiniay pakuniza milupu mitiik atu pikelec mikena tu sin-bun tu tumisakakuay mikawaw, uynian a kanatal katenes mahiza tu masasiput ku nipikuwan tu tademaw atu nisulitan tu mahiniay a kawaw. payawan Central african republic a kayadah nu kuang-cang atu lalayan a kasilacul, mahiniay u You nisupedan kayadah simal , u kimng , malikaday a ba'tu , Cu ,kasuy , u nanum dingki atu kakalukan a lala', mahiniay tu i kitakit u sapakuyucay saka cacay bataan ku cacay a kanatal, katukuh ayza i 2017 a mihcaan, Central african republic a tademaw GDP "u nipicakay u lecat nu aca aniasipan" i tini i kitakit u pasazikuzan a miasip u saayaway, 2019 a mihcaan, Central african republic a tatemaw nipaalekalan a tinsu i tini i kitakit u pasazikuzan a miasip u sakatusa, i tini dada' talakaw tu ni-rl a kanatal, izaw patahkal ku nigingkuwan , Central african republic i kitakitan u cayay ka tanektek a kanatal atu u cayay katatunus tu masakapahay a tademaw nu kanatal. ayaw pakala tu 10,000 a mihcaan, malakedakedalan tu umiadupay u mialaay tu misupeday a niyazu' pasatimul mabulaw katukuh i Zung-bey nuwamisan a Sa-he-lel a kakitizaan, uynian a niyazu' malinga'tu tu mananel malukay ku kawaw. kunian mala u baluhay ba'tuay a zi-tay palekal tu zumaay a ngangayaw. kasumamadan tu pitu a mihcaan Zung-bey katuud tu ku muenengay itizi a tademaw, u heni u zuma makuwan nu pinay tu nu Ta-di-ku a kanatal, cunus tu Jiy-nie-mu-mu-po-nu (Kanem-Bornu), Ua-da-iy (Ouaddai),Pa-ci-rl-mi (Baguirmi)atu tutuc tu papaway a Ni-lu , Ca-de-hu u angangan nu Da-bu (Dafour)a niyazu', namahiza satu zikuzan satu, katuuday a Su-dan a kanatal pangiha musakamu izaway tu ayzaay a Zung-bey , mala u makayniay ku kuli, mala u pacakayay tu lumeni'ay a kuli u caculilan a zazan. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 在7世紀, -博努(Kanem-Bornu),瓦達伊(Ouaddai),巴吉爾米(Baguirmi) (Dafour)部落.後來, .) 1875 a mihcaan Su-dan a kanatal Su-dan mikuwan tu ku U-ban-ci(烏班基Rabih az-Zubayr), 1894 a mihcaan tungusay tu nu Kang-ku ,,1903 a mihcaan u Fa-ku tungusay nu U-ban-ci(烏班基Rabih az-Zubayr) (Territoire d'Oubangui-Chari)a lala',1910 a mihcaan u Fa-ku tungusay nu Ce-taw-fiy-cow , 1958 a mihcaan patingen tu sakaku a cenbu, satu pala u pangkiway a ce-ceay Central african republic (Répulique Centrafricaine), ci Pa-tay-le-mi-po-kang-ta u saayaway mala micuwanay tu cenbu,,1959 a mihcaan ci Po-kang-ea mapatay i kahetik nu hikuki, ci Da-wey-da-ke (David Dacko) ku micalukay mala mikuwanay nu cenbu. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 1875年,蘇丹國蘇丹Rabih az-Zubayr (Territoire d'Oubangui-Chari),1910 (Répulique Centrafricaine), (David Dacko)繼任為總理.) 1960 a mihcaan 8 a bulad 13 a mihcaan namiskaku kuCentral african republic hawsa, ci Da-wey-da-ke mananunul mala cung-dung , caay katenes mala u tiniay a kanatal usaayaway mala cung-dung , mikawaw tu cacayay a sakapu nu cenbu amiteked amicuean, 1965 a mihcaan 12 a bulad 31 a demiad tusansandeban , u sakakaay nu hitay, i hekalay a hitay tu sakakaay ci Pu-ksa'-sang-siaw palekal pasazuma tu kawaw nu cenbu mibelin tu Da-ke-da-ka-sa i sakatusa a demiad sateked sa cung-dung , ci Pu-ksa'-sang tahekal amicuzuh amicukah a kawaw, mangelu' ku tademaw 1976 a mihcaan 12 a bulad 4 a demiad, ci Pu-ksa'-sang sakaku sa a mala hun-ti, pasumat tu ngangan nu kanatal Zung-bey hung-ti a kanatal saan, satu i tucilal a mihcaan 12 a bulad 4 a demiad mikawaw tu tabakiay a pacakat tu kawaw. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 1979年9月20日, .) 1981 a mihcaan 9 a bulad ci, An-de-liy-ke-lin-pa sakakaay nu hitay palekal misumat tu kawaw nu cen-ce,mipabelin ci Da-ce , u sakakaay tu satalakaway a tabang nu kanatal, 1993 a mihcaan, Zung-bey mikawaw tu i laylayay u saayaway u binawlan ku misingkiway, ci An-ce-biy-li-ce-se-pa-da-say malaay mala cung-tung , 2003 a mihcaan 3 a bulad ayaw nu sikuwanay sibakudangay , midebung tu kahenulan a tuse nu ,u cenbu ni Pa-da-say pabelin, ci Pu-si-ce sakaku sa patizeng mala cung-dung , ci Pu-si-ce i 2005 a mihcaan tu pisingkiwan pakatemec mala cung-dung tu, nami mililabang tu milakalakay i Hay-di a cung-dung ci A-li-se-di-de . kakitizaan atu wayway nu lala'位置與地形 Central african republic i tini i amisan tulu du katukuh sabaw cacay a du an, uynian a kanatal i tini i fiy-cow-ta-lu tu kapulangan a kasaupuan, u tinulan tayza nuwamisan pasayza nuwalian satipan u kakayzaan mucilil a zazan, u pingayawan a kakitizaan u sakahenulan mahamin a kanatal pulung nu hekal 62 bam 5900 pin-bang-kung-li , Zung-bey a nuwalian nuamisan atu Su-dan matatules ku lala', nuwalian mitules tu timulan a 蘇丹, nutimulan a lilis u the republic of the , satipan timulan u belaw u Kang-ku , satipan mitules tu Ce-may-lung , nuwamisan atu Ha-de u laet tu bayu pakala tu cacay a malebud kung-li , u nayay ku sacumut nu bayu lalabuay nu tukus a kanatal, talabu nu kanatal a lala' satalakawsa uyni u adidi'ay sahebunghebung , palalicat tu talakaw pakalatu pitu lasubu a depa 9 kung-ce ,nu Fay cuw tepan atu timulan u satalakaway kakitizaanay. i lalabu Zun-bia中非 a kanatal, mabalad u sauwac angangan a sauwac, izaw ku atu曼波河(Mambere)u diheb a sauwac masaenal ku lala' tusaay a tukus ilikutay a lala' atu talakaway a buyubuyu'an. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: (Mambere)等, .) demiad氣候 Central african republic atu nuwamisan tungusay i akudi'ay a nalinabuan a kakitizaan a bali, nutinulan uyza u akuti'ay a kilakilangan ku demiad, palalecad tunu akuti' nu hekal, pakala tu se-se 27.8 du: hua-se82 du", nutimulanay u nikaudad katanayu' katukuh i walu a buladan tabaki ku udada i satimulan pamihcaan tu udad pakala tu cacay malebud tusa lasubud haw-mi, u diheb a sauwac i capiay masemed aca tatungus tu sakalukan. miciliway a hitay tu mikulinuway 2004 a mihcaan 12 a bulad 5 demiad mamin u binawlan ku paketunay maawas tu balyhay a hulic, lekec tu cung-tung mala u talakaway a tapang nu kanatal, u nikakelul nisingkiuwan ku a Cung-tung, lima a mihcaan ku kala Cung-tungan, taneng malalit kinacacay, cung-li u tapang nu cen-bu, u Cung-tung ku situngusay, baluhay a hulic malaheci hawsa saayaway lekec u cu-min-yi'-huy izaw ku 105 a giing, kakelul sanay tu ku pisingkuw lima a mihcaan pala Cung-tungan. Central african republic i kitakit u saadidi'ay nipahalat u kaluk namisatekat cen-bu miida tu nutauwan a kanatal tu pipatang. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: .) malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan CIA アフリカ共和国 Central African Republic Bangui

Central african repoblic o siwkay no kanatal o Central african repoblic sa i labo no Africa, itiza i 7 00 N, 21 00 E, o ahebal no lala' mapolong sa 622,984 km2, o ahebal no lala'ay sa 622,984 km2, o ahebal no nanomay sa 0 km2 hamin no tademaw sa 5,507,257. kakalokan omah sa 8.10%, kilakilangan omah sa 36.20%, zomaay henay omah sa 55.70% tapang toso no kanatal o tapang toso no kanatal sa o Bangoi . kakininan no kanatal demiad kakining no kanatal demiad sa 1 bolad 12 demiad. tabakiay a tapang no kanatal o tabakiay a tapang no kanatal (congtong) ayza sa ci Faostin-Archange Tooadéra, micakat a demiad sa i 2016 a mihca 3 bolad 30 demiad. o hata o kolit no hata kina kanatal sa, silima ko kolit, o semilaway, o sangelacay, o landaway, o takoliway ato somanahay. sibonac a kolit i kalimoco no hata. o solit no zoma a kamo o solit no Holam: 中非共和國 o solit no Lipon: 中央アフリカ共和国 o solit no Amilik: Central African Repoblic Central african repoblic "Fa-yo , Répobliqoe centrafricaine", "Sang-ke-yo , Ködörösêse tî Bêafrîka", singangan to no Zong-bey , Ban-ci o kahenolan a tose no Zong-bey , i tini i tebang no Zong-bey a kanatal,mala o lalaboay a tokos no kanatal, Zong-bey namakaysatipan malingato dodoc to no piliyoc no toki a pasayzaan, pasazomaen to Ke-may-long , Cha-de , So-tan , Nan-so-tan , Democratic Repoblic of the Congo ato Congo, the repoblic of the matatoles tolala', Zong-bey palekal i 1958 a mihcaan 12 a bolad, namalingato to pangkiw a misakako kono cenhoay sato 1960 a mihcaan 8 a bolad 13 a demiad tatengaay to manosakamo to mamisateked, kahenolan a tose a Ban-ci opabelin a kamo Ban-cy han, i tini i U-ban-ci-he mililis no tokos i tapiingan no tose. (o kamo no Holam sa: 中非共和國(法語:Répobliqoe centrafricaine；桑戈語:Ködörösêse tî Bêafrîka),通稱中非,班基(Bangoi)- (Bangoi, (Oobangoi)沿岸的邊境城市.) ayaw no Zong-bey tongosay no U-ban-ci-siya-li (Territoire d'Oobangoi-Chari)a lala', no Fa-ko i tiniay i Fay-cow no micomotay, 1960 a mihcaan namisateked, Central african repoblic mikilol to no holic mikeliday a tademaw ko mikowanay paso nacacay mademec mitanam to no hong-ti a lice, 1993 a mihcaan, i kacakat no ka conosan to demiad tanotowa' sako soni no binawlan, Zong-bey kinacacay henay no binawlan a pisingkiw ci An-ze-fay-li-ke-si-pa-ta-say ko mala cong-tongay, 2003 a mihcaan Zong-bey masomat kokawaw no hitay, ci Pa-ta-say-pa-fo-lang-soo-wa-bo-ci-ze o sakakaay a hitay mapaales. 2004 a mihcaan mabowah mangangaay ko lalaboay, ano mahicahica milihiza to no tatosa a ngangayaw i 2007 a mihcaan masasolit paketon to masasokapah a tatelek , ato 2011 a mihcaan masasolit makaketon asa to zomaay cacay a lice, a masasokapah a tateled, nika i 2012 a mihcaan masacokah aca, lalid sato mangangaay ato milihicaay a ngangayaw sikowang sibakodang toko sakapot katood maconos toko micalap to mikowanay to tademaw a kawaw, mahiniay pakoniza milopo mitiik ato pikelec mikena to sin-bon to tomisakakoay mikawaw, oynian a kanatal katenes mahiza to masasipot ko nipikowan to tademaw ato nisolitan to mahiniay a kawaw. payawan Central african repoblic a kayadah no koang-cang ato lalayan a kasilacol, mahiniay o Yoo nisopedan kayadah simal , o kimng , malikaday a ba'to , Co ,kasoy , o nanom dingki ato kakalokan a lala', mahiniay to i kitakit o sapakoyocay saka cacay bataan ko cacay a kanatal, katokoh ayza i 2017 a mihcaan, Central african repoblic a tademaw GDP "o nipicakay o lecat no aca aniasipan" i tini i kitakit o pasazikozan a miasip o saayaway, 2019 a mihcaan, Central african repoblic a tatemaw nipaalekalan a tinso i tini i kitakit o pasazikozan a miasip o sakatosa, i tini dada' talakaw to ni-rl a kanatal, izaw patahkal ko nigingkowan , Central african repoblic i kitakitan o cayay ka tanektek a kanatal ato o cayay katatonos to masakapahay a tademaw no kanatal. ayaw pakala to 10,000 a mihcaan, malakedakedalan to omiadopay o mialaay to misopeday a niyazo' pasatimol mabolaw katokoh i Zong-bey nowamisan a Sa-he-lel a kakitizaan, oynian a niyazo' malinga'to to mananel malokay ko kawaw. konian mala o balohay ba'toay a zi-tay palekal to zomaay a ngangayaw. kasomamadan to pito a mihcaan Zong-bey katood to ko moenengay itizi a tademaw, o heni o zoma makowan no pinay to no Ta-di-ko a kanatal, conos to Jiy-nie-mo-mo-po-no (Kanem-Borno), Ua-da-iy (Ooaddai),Pa-ci-rl-mi (Bagoirmi)ato totoc to papaway a Ni-lo , Ca-de-ho o angangan no Da-bo (Dafoor)a niyazo', namahiza sato zikozan sato, katooday a So-dan a kanatal pangiha mosakamo izaway to ayzaay a Zong-bey , mala o makayniay ko koli, mala o pacakayay to lomeni'ay a koli o cacolilan a zazan. (o kamo no Holam sa: 在7世紀, -博努(Kanem-Borno),瓦達伊(Ooaddai),巴吉爾米(Bagoirmi) (Dafoor)部落.後來, .) 1875 a mihcaan So-dan a kanatal So-dan mikowan to ko U-ban-ci(烏班基Rabih az-Zobayr), 1894 a mihcaan tongosay to no Kang-ko ,,1903 a mihcaan o Fa-ko tongosay no U-ban-ci(烏班基Rabih az-Zobayr) (Territoire d'Oobangoi-Chari)a lala',1910 a mihcaan o Fa-ko tongosay no Ce-taw-fiy-cow , 1958 a mihcaan patingen to sakako a cenbo, sato pala o pangkiway a ce-ceay Central african repoblic (Répoliqoe Centrafricaine), ci Pa-tay-le-mi-po-kang-ta o saayaway mala micowanay to cenbo,,1959 a mihcaan ci Po-kang-ea mapatay i kahetik no hikoki, ci Da-wey-da-ke (David Dacko) ko micalokay mala mikowanay no cenbo. (o kamo no Holam sa: 1875年,蘇丹國蘇丹Rabih az-Zobayr (Territoire d'Oobangoi-Chari),1910 (Répoliqoe Centrafricaine), (David Dacko)繼任為總理.) 1960 a mihcaan 8 a bolad 13 a mihcaan namiskako koCentral african repoblic hawsa, ci Da-wey-da-ke mananonol mala cong-dong , caay katenes mala o tiniay a kanatal osaayaway mala cong-dong , mikawaw to cacayay a sakapo no cenbo amiteked amicoean, 1965 a mihcaan 12 a bolad 31 a demiad tosansandeban , o sakakaay no hitay, i hekalay a hitay to sakakaay ci Po-ksa'-sang-siaw palekal pasazoma to kawaw no cenbo mibelin to Da-ke-da-ka-sa i sakatosa a demiad sateked sa cong-dong , ci Po-ksa'-sang tahekal amicozoh amicokah a kawaw, mangelo' ko tademaw 1976 a mihcaan 12 a bolad 4 a demiad, ci Po-ksa'-sang sakako sa a mala hon-ti, pasomat to ngangan no kanatal Zong-bey hong-ti a kanatal saan, sato i tocilal a mihcaan 12 a bolad 4 a demiad mikawaw to tabakiay a pacakat to kawaw. (o kamo no Holam sa: 1979年9月20日, .) 1981 a mihcaan 9 a bolad ci, An-de-liy-ke-lin-pa sakakaay no hitay palekal misomat to kawaw no cen-ce,mipabelin ci Da-ce , o sakakaay to satalakaway a tabang no kanatal, 1993 a mihcaan, Zong-bey mikawaw to i laylayay o saayaway o binawlan ko misingkiway, ci An-ce-biy-li-ce-se-pa-da-say malaay mala cong-tong , 2003 a mihcaan 3 a bolad ayaw no sikowanay sibakodangay , midebong to kahenolan a tose no ,o cenbo ni Pa-da-say pabelin, ci Po-si-ce sakako sa patizeng mala cong-dong , ci Po-si-ce i 2005 a mihcaan to pisingkiwan pakatemec mala cong-dong to, nami mililabang to milakalakay i Hay-di a cong-dong ci A-li-se-di-de . kakitizaan ato wayway no lala'位置與地形 Central african repoblic i tini i amisan tolo do katokoh sabaw cacay a do an, oynian a kanatal i tini i fiy-cow-ta-lo to kapolangan a kasaopoan, o tinolan tayza nowamisan pasayza nowalian satipan o kakayzaan mocilil a zazan, o pingayawan a kakitizaan o sakahenolan mahamin a kanatal polong no hekal 62 bam 5900 pin-bang-kong-li , Zong-bey a nowalian noamisan ato So-dan matatoles ko lala', nowalian mitoles to timolan a 蘇丹, notimolan a lilis o the repoblic of the , satipan timolan o belaw o Kang-ko , satipan mitoles to Ce-may-long , nowamisan ato Ha-de o laet to bayo pakala to cacay a malebod kong-li , o nayay ko sacomot no bayo lalaboay no tokos a kanatal, talabo no kanatal a lala' satalakawsa oyni o adidi'ay sahebonghebong , palalicat to talakaw pakalato pito lasobo a depa 9 kong-ce ,no Fay cow tepan ato timolan o satalakaway kakitizaanay. i lalabo Zon-bia中非 a kanatal, mabalad o saowac angangan a saowac, izaw ko ato曼波河(Mambere)o diheb a saowac masaenal ko lala' tosaay a tokos ilikotay a lala' ato talakaway a boyoboyo'an. (o kamo no Holam sa: (Mambere)等, .) demiad氣候 Central african repoblic ato nowamisan tongosay i akodi'ay a nalinaboan a kakitizaan a bali, notinolan oyza o akoti'ay a kilakilangan ko demiad, palalecad tono akoti' no hekal, pakala to se-se 27.8 do: hoa-se82 do", notimolanay o nikaodad katanayo' katokoh i walo a boladan tabaki ko odada i satimolan pamihcaan to odad pakala to cacay malebod tosa lasobod haw-mi, o diheb a saowac i capiay masemed aca tatongos to sakalokan. miciliway a hitay to mikolinoway 2004 a mihcaan 12 a bolad 5 demiad mamin o binawlan ko paketonay maawas to balyhay a holic, lekec to cong-tong mala o talakaway a tapang no kanatal, o nikakelol nisingkiowan ko a Cong-tong, lima a mihcaan ko kala Cong-tongan, taneng malalit kinacacay, cong-li o tapang no cen-bo, o Cong-tong ko sitongosay, balohay a holic malaheci hawsa saayaway lekec o co-min-yi'-hoy izaw ko 105 a giing, kakelol sanay to ko pisingkow lima a mihcaan pala Cong-tongan. Central african repoblic i kitakit o saadidi'ay nipahalat o kalok namisatekat cen-bo miida to notaowan a kanatal to pipatang. (o kamo no Holam sa: .) malalitin to ihekalay ato zomaay a natinengan CIA アフリカ共和国 Central African Repoblic Bangoi
